data_usage: To display recent variations of the Power Dissipation Index (PDI), illustrating overall hurricane activity (intensity, frequency, and duration) in a hurricane season.
methodology:
Power dissipation was calculated following the methods published in Emanuel 200.

The trend line was calculated using ordinary least squares regression line

Thinner lines represent raw data. Thicker lines represent a 1-4-6-4-1 binomial filter.
